General.Name: Shenzhen Click Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Click Technology Co., Ltd. designs, produces, sells, and services LED lighting power supplies, power battery chargers, communication power supplies, adapters, magnetic components, electric car chargers, charging piles, and others in China and internationally. It offers switching power supply products, such as charging power, power adapter, LED driver, and industrial telecom power; magnetic components, that includes traditional industries and new energy magnetics; new energy products, such as AC/DC vehicle charger, DC/DC power, and inverters. In addition, it also provides industry solutions, such as custom power supply, electric vehicle charger, high power transformer, charging power supply, terminal adapter, led power supply, and design verification; and technical innovation, that includes R&D capabilities, transformer technology, and power technology. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Australia, South America, and other Asian countries and regions. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

1.Name: Ms. Chunxia  Wu
1.Title: CFO, Sec. to the Board & Director
